2138e62b-fcc7-4ac2-9727-50b28d20061f.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of the federal student aid system. Participants exit the boot camp experience with a general understanding of federal student aid programs, how the Free Application for Federal Student Aid works, student loan borrowing patterns, student loan debt and default, federal student aid repayment programs, and the role loan servicers play in the federal Direct Loan system.
2138e62b-fcc7-4ac2-9727-50b28d20061f.name: PNPI Federal Student Aid Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day Federal Student Aid Boot Camp. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include: Pell Grants, federal student loans, the FAFSA, student loan debt, federal student loan repayment, and federal student loan servicing.

07daa7c2-8f7b-4ce7-a050-2561f0c8cb44.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of the federal student aid system. Participants exit the boot camp experience with a general understanding of federal student aid programs, how the Free Application for Federal Student Aid works, student loan borrowing patterns, student loan debt and default, federal student aid repayment programs, and the role loan servicers play in the federal Direct Loan system.
07daa7c2-8f7b-4ce7-a050-2561f0c8cb44.name: Virtual Federal Student Aid Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Federal Student Aid Boot Camp. Speakers include issue experts and practitioners. Topics include: the FAFSA, the EFC, the Pell Grant, federal student loans, student loan debt and default, federal student loan repayment, and federal student loan servicing.

ca48a775-7671-4db2-a912-756bc7bc45af.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of federal postsecondary data. Participants exit the boot camp with a general understanding of the postsecondary data sets housed and maintained at the U.S. Department of Education, federal student loan data sets, postsecondary data linkages across federal agencies, and the limitations of current federal postsecondary data sources. Participants will have completed data exercises meant to increase their knowledge of the course content.
ca48a775-7671-4db2-a912-756bc7bc45af.name: Federal Postsecondary Data Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Federal Postsecondary Data Boot Camp. Speakers include issue experts and practitioners. Topics include: federal postsecondary data sets, federal student loan data, linkages across federal data systems, and postsecondary data limitations.

5ebb7b79-ccca-459b-948a-4a1ce8933d61.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of student loan borrowing patterns; federal student loan repayment plans; student loan delinquency and default; family wealth and how it intersects with demographics; the Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF) Program; and the federal student loan program's cost.
5ebb7b79-ccca-459b-948a-4a1ce8933d61.name: PNPI Federal Student Loan Debt & Repayment Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day Federal Student Loan Debt & Repayment Boot Camp. Faculty include issue experts and practitioners.

68564c8d-875a-4ddb-9e8a-08828bcb134e.description: Earners of this badge have developed foundational knowledge of the federal budget process. Badge earners have exited the virtual training with knowledge of how the federal budget and appropriations process works, an understanding of what budget reconciliation is, and an understanding of how Federal Student Aid impacts, and is impacted by, budgetary decisions.
68564c8d-875a-4ddb-9e8a-08828bcb134e.name: Higher Education Boot Camp on the Federal Budget Process

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Higher Education Boot Camp on the Federal Budget Process. Faculty include budget and appropriations experts, practitioners, and former legislative and executive branch staff. Topics include: the federal budget process, the congressional appropriations process, and Federal Student Aid in the federal budget.

e838dfa1-8fa5-4cc3-8a2f-1aa7ffa9a33b.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of federal need analysis. Participants exit the virtual boot camp with a general understanding of cost of attendance and its relationships to federal student aid, the federal methodology for need analysis, the verification process as it relates to federal student aid, what professional judgment is and how it is applied, and how financial aid is packaged and students are notified of their financial aid.
e838dfa1-8fa5-4cc3-8a2f-1aa7ffa9a33b.name: Need Analysis Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Need Analysis Boot Camp. Faculty include issue experts and practitioners. Topics include cost of attendance, federal methodology, verification, professional judgement, and packaging and notification.

c9d6127b-6659-461a-b7a9-5fbdee31090a.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of the federal student loan servicing system. Participants exit the program with a general understanding of how the servicing system works, how actors in the system interact, and how servicers are selected and monitored. Knowledge gained can be leveraged to provide analyses of the system’s strengths and weaknesses, craft potential improvements to the program, and write and analyze legislative proposals.
c9d6127b-6659-461a-b7a9-5fbdee31090a.name: PNPI Federal Student Loan Servicing

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day Federal Student Loan Servicing Boot Camp.

627028e1-ef51-49ed-b259-59b155a45904.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational understanding of the Higher Education Opportunity Act's (HEOA) non-title IV provisions.
627028e1-ef51-49ed-b259-59b155a45904.name: PNPI's HEOA Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in PNPI's Higher Education Opportunity Act (HEOA) Boot Camp, consisting of four trainings covering Titles I, II, III, V, VI, VII, and VIII of the HEOA. Badge earners must participate in all sessions. Faculty include issue experts and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include: consumer protections, teacher education, Minority Serving Institutions (MSIs), international education, graduate education, and FIPSE.

a8a2fd8b-9e82-463b-ba93-719a46f217e2.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of college cost. Participants exit the boot camp with a general understanding of the sticker and net price of college, cost of attendance, college cost drivers, and provisions in current law meant to increase college affordability.
a8a2fd8b-9e82-463b-ba93-719a46f217e2.name: PNPI College Cost Boot Camp

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day virtual College Cost Boot Camp. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include: college cost vs. price, net price calculators, cost of attendance, drivers of college cost, and federal levers meant to increase college affordability.

f2829623-9f7e-4823-bdeb-390120328475.description: Earners of this badge have honed their executive presence and executive decision-making skills. Participants have demonstrated an understanding of how to make impactful decisions, develop effective teams, innovate on demand, run effective meetings, and tell their organization’s story.
f2829623-9f7e-4823-bdeb-390120328475.name: PNPI's Leadership Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to and be accepted into the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Leadership Development Program (LDP). Participate in six experiential workshops focused on effective meetings, decision making, team building, innovating on demand, executive presence, and telling one’s organizational story.  Craft and deliver a meaningful leadership declaration. Learn and apply peer coaching methods.

a42366da-ac0c-4e4d-b071-d93192970238.description: Earners of this badge have developed a general understanding of what misrepresentation, state authorization, incentive compensation, and gainful employment are as they relate to higher education.
a42366da-ac0c-4e4d-b071-d93192970238.name: Higher Education Boot Camp on Program Integrity

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Higher Education Boot Camp on Program Integrity. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include misrepresentation, state authorization, incentive compensation, and gainful employment.

84bf942d-aaad-4fe2-940d-26abda1b89be.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of federal need analysis. Participants exit the virtual training with a general understanding of cost of attendance and its relationships to federal student aid, the federal methodology for need analysis, the verification process as it relates to federal student aid, what professional judgment is and how it is applied, and how financial aid is packaged and students are notified of their financial aid.
84bf942d-aaad-4fe2-940d-26abda1b89be.name: Need Analysis Training

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Need Analysis Training. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include: cost of attendance, federal methodology, verification, professional judgement, and packaging and notification.

b37f3129-e65b-40c4-9f24-b38a28994749.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of federal postsecondary accreditation. Participants exit the program with a general understanding of what higher education accreditation is, how it works, and how actors in the system interact. They have also spent time considering critiques of the current system and potential accreditation reforms. Knowledge gained from the program can be used to provide system analysis, write legislative proposals, and craft potential reforms.
b37f3129-e65b-40c4-9f24-b38a28994749.name: PNPI Higher Education Accreditation

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day Higher Education Accreditation Seminar.

e2383955-bd90-4c8f-9553-f87f138694fe.description: Earners of this badge have developed a general understanding of what incentive compensation, misrepresentation and gainful employment are as they relate to higher education, and will review the regulatory history of each.
e2383955-bd90-4c8f-9553-f87f138694fe.name: Program Integrity Training

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Program Integrity Training. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include incentive compensation, misrepresentation, and gainful employment..

7c5d30f9-d61f-4db5-af8e-4cebbe13ddb7.description: Earners of this badge have developed their leadership abilities and gained tools, knowledge, and resources to help them strengthen and impact their teams and organizations. Participants have demonstrated an understanding of developing and impacting effective teams, facilitating engaging meetings and events, confidently communicating about equity, and developing their executive presence.
7c5d30f9-d61f-4db5-af8e-4cebbe13ddb7.name: PNPI's Emerging Leaders Development Program

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to and be accepted into the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Emerging Leaders Development Program (ELDP). Participate in orientation, a course practicum as well as seven out of eight working sessions focused on strengthening and impacting effective teams, designing engaging meetings and events, communicating about equity, developing executive presence, and peer coaching.

7d1a2068-cb4b-4ee1-98d6-55cd0ac5d5c7.description: Earners of this badge have developed a general understanding of the current federal student loan repayment programs; forbearance, deferment, and student loan default; and how factors like socioeconomic status, family wealth, race, and post-graduation income intersect with a borrower’s debt and default patterns.
7d1a2068-cb4b-4ee1-98d6-55cd0ac5d5c7.name: PNPI Federal Student Loan Repayment Training

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Federal Student Loan Repayment Training. Faculty include issue experts, practitioners, and former legislative/executive branch staff. Topics include the federal student loan repayment programs and student loan forbearance, deferment, and default.

a10ba343-5f25-4627-a968-0a6e031ee227.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of the federal student aid system. Participants exit the training with a general understanding of the Federal Pell Grant Program, student loan borrowing patterns, student loan debt, federal student aid repayment programs, and federal student loan delinquency and default.
a10ba343-5f25-4627-a968-0a6e031ee227.name: Federal Student Aid Training

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s virtual Federal Student Aid (FSA) Training. Speakers include issue experts and practitioners. Topics include: the Pell Grant, federal student loans, the EFC, federal student loan debt, and federal student loan repayment and default.

Topics include: the federal budget process, the congressional appropriations process, and Federal Student Aid in the federal budget.

e22bc3c8-af63-4e91-86a3-66bf59b7b257.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of student loan borrowing patterns; federal student loan repayment plans; student loan delinquency and default and how they intersect with demographics; the Public Service Loan Forgiveness (PSLF) Program; and the federal student loan program's cost.

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s two-day Federal Student Loan Debt & Repayment Seminar. Faculty includes issue experts and practitioners.

8371726b-fdf5-4782-8f94-9fdfbf41304d.description: Earners of this badge have developed a foundational knowledge of the federal student aid (FSA) system. Participants exit the course with a general understanding of federal student aid programs, how the Free Application for Federal Student Aid works, student loan borrowing patterns, student loan debt and default, and federal student aid repayment programs.
8371726b-fdf5-4782-8f94-9fdfbf41304d.name: PNPI FSA 101

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Full participation in the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s online FSA 101. Topics include Pell Grants, federal student loans, the FAFSA, student loan debt, and federal student loan repayment.

83c1d380-5091-423c-b6d1-83533b26f9c5.description: Earners of this badge have honed their executive presence. Participants have demonstrated an understanding of how to develop effective teams, innovate on demand, run effective meetings, and apply an equity lens to policymaking.
83c1d380-5091-423c-b6d1-83533b26f9c5.name: PNPI's Leadership Development Program 2023

issuer.summary: issued by Postsecondary National Policy Institute (PNPI)

badge_template_activities.title: Apply to and be accepted into the Postsecondary National Policy Institute’s Leadership Development Program (LDP). Participate in five experiential workshops focused on effective meetings, diversity, equity, and inclusion, team building, innovating on demand, and executive presence. Craft and deliver a meaningful leadership declaration. Learn and apply peer coaching methods.
